item.title: Engage Encounter Weekends For Year 2021
item.description:
1. The Catholic Engaged Encounter, Penang are pleased to inform you that the EE Weekend for the year 2021 will be held as follows:
  • EE126 5-7 Mar 2021 @ Stella Maris, Tanjung Bungah/online (JUST CONCLUDED)
  • EE127 28-30 May 2021 @ Stella Maris, Tanjung Bungah/online (CLOSED)
  • EE128 27-29 Aug 2021 @ Stella Maris, Tanjung Bungah/online (AVAILABLE)
  • EE129 19-21 Nov 2021 @ Stella Maris, Tanjung Bungah/online (AVAILABLE)

  1. Application forms can also be obtained from our Parish office or directly download here.

  2. For registration, please contact the registration couple Nicholas-Christine 017-5959790; for general inquiries, please contact the coordinating couple Bart-Angie 017-5900978.

item.title: Mass Offering
item.description:
Make a Mass Offer

The Church considers the Mass the greatest possible prayer of intercession because it is the perfect offering of Christ to the Father by making present the Paschal Mystery of His death and resurrection. It is a longstanding tradition in the Church that a Priest may be requested to offer a Mass for a specific intention, even when one cannot be physically present at the Mass.

  • Fill in the form here and attach a banking slip.
  • Otherwise, please walk in to the parish office to have your mass offering handled by our admin office.
